resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
pitrou opened a new pull request, #14571:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14571

   Fix a couple compilation issues (implicit this-capturing with "=" in lambdas is deprecated in C++20).

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14571#issuecomment-1302220065

   ['Python', 'R'] benchmarks have high level of regressions.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: We currently have a {{test-ubuntu-20.04-cpp-17}} nightly job that has become redundant since the switch to C\+\+17. We could instead turn this job into a C\+\+20-enabled build job, to weed out any potential incompatibilities.
fields.summary: [CI][C++] Add a nightly build for C++20 compilation
